description: This file defines a mock class 'DRMMock' for the 'drmImpl' interface, utilizing Google Mock to facilitate unit testing by simulating DRM-related function calls.
external_methods: MOCK_METHOD(drmModeObjectPropertiesPtr, drmModeObjectGetProperties, (int fd, uint32_t object_id, uint32_t object_type), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(int, drmSetClientCap, (int fd, uint64_t capability, uint64_t value), (override))

classes.name: DRMMock
classes.description: A mock class for drmImpl interface, providing mocked implementations for DRM-related functions using Google Mock for unit testing purposes.

methods.name: drmModeGetEncoder
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of a DRM encoder object by its ID.

methods.name: drmModeFreeEncoder
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of a DRM encoder object.

methods.name: drmModeGetConnector
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of a DRM connector object.

methods.name: drmModeGetCrtc
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of a DRM CRTC object.

methods.name: drmModeGetResources
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of DRM resource information.

methods.name: drmModeFreeConnector
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of a DRM connector.

methods.name: drmModeFreeCrtc
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of a DRM CRTC.

methods.name: drmModeFreeResources
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of DRM resource data.

methods.name: drmModeGetProperty
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of a DRM property.

methods.name: drmModeFreeProperty
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of DRM property data.

methods.name: drmModeGetPlaneResources
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of plane resources.

methods.name: drmModeGetPlane
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of plane data.

methods.name: drmModeObjectGetProperties
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of object properties.

methods.name: drmModeFreeObjectProperties
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of object properties.

methods.name: drmModeFreePlane
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of a plane.

methods.name: drmModeFreePlaneResources
methods.description: Mocks the freeing of plane resources.

methods.name: drmSetClientCap
methods.description: Mocks setting a DRM client capability.

methods.name: drmModeGetFB
methods.description: Mocks the retrieval of framebuffer information.
